trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_000<tab>Hey there, friend. Is there something I can do for you?
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_001<tab>We received word that Valigarmanda's been set free. If there's something you wished to ask, I suggest we keep it brief.
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_002<tab>Have you heard the news? The fell beast Valigarmanda was slain! And for a mercy, there were no casualties to speak of.

TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_003<tab>The rite of succession is over, and not one, but <var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> Dawnservants have taken the throne by the sounds of it. I can but wonder what the future holds for Tural.
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_004<tab>Welcome, welcome! Any friend of the Dawnservants is a friend of ours. How can I help you?

TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_010<tab>I was a merchant peddling wares, once upon a time, but I hurt my back carrying one too many boxes that were just a <var 1A 02 /var>little<var 1A 01 /var> too heavy. Now I mostly serve as a guide to travelers passing through.

TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_011<tab>We Pelupelu endeavor to make every trade an amicable one, and spread happiness through our business. You would be hard-pressed to find anyone dissatisfied after dealing with us.
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_012<tab>Of course, with the threat of Valigarmanda looming, business has proven quite difficult of late.
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_020<tab>Merchants and mercenaries often stop here at Icuvlo's Inn to lay their heads before traveling elsewhere.
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_021<tab>I always recommend they spend a day at Panaqpelu Retreat. The hot springs do wonders for my back. If you plan to stay at the inn, you simply must try it.
TEXT_REGYOK6ICUVLOSINN_00868_OVLI_000_022<tab>I would understand if you didn't, of course. With Valigarmanda free, this is no time to be relaxing.
